sentences.en: 'The past is more important,'agreed O'Brien gravely.
sentences.cn: “ 过去更重要.”奥勃良神情严肃地表示同意.

sentences.en: " It's a bad sign,'said Aunt Polly, gravely. " What you got on your mind, Tom? "
sentences.cn: “ 这可不是好兆头, ” 波莉姨妈阴着脸说, “ 汤姆. 你有什么心事 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: "I think I've covered that business more than adequately," he said gravely.
sentences.cn: “我想我已经把那件事说得够详细了，”他正色说道。

sentences.en: "Its rarity value is high," Gibson announced gravely.
sentences.cn: “它极为稀罕，”吉布森严肃地宣布。

sentences.en: "Yes, well – that certainly happened to me, " he said gravely, recounting the first time he learnt a Latin name of a plant.
sentences.cn: “呃，是的——那个我也经历过，”他严肃地说，回顾他头一次知道某种植物的拉丁名的感觉。

sentences.en: A change had come over him, and he spoke gravely, and with decision.
sentences.cn: 他身上起了变化, 他说话很严肃, 而且很果断.

sentences.en: But he is denounced - and gravely - by the Citizen and Citizeness Defarge.
sentences.cn: 不过告发他的 —— 严重告发他的 —— 是公民德伐日夫妇.

sentences.en: Gravely the men turn in at a house -- the wrong house.
sentences.cn: 那几个人郑重其事地转身走进一所房子 —— 走错了地方.

sentences.en: He enunciated the word and then drank gravely.
sentences.cn: 他一字一顿地说,然后庄重地品酒.

sentences.en: He spoke gravely of the situation.
sentences.cn: 他心情沉重地谈论着局势.

sentences.en: His formulation is gravely lacking in mathematical rigour.
sentences.cn: 他的公式严重缺乏数学上的严密性.

sentences.en: I showed him the telegram, which read simply:'Gravely injured come at once Sebastian.'
sentences.cn: 我把电报拿给他看, 电报写得很简单: “ 伤势严重速来塞巴斯蒂安. ”

sentences.en: If you think that, you are gravely mistaken.
sentences.cn: 你若是那样想, 就大错特错了.

sentences.en: No, I should never love anybody better than papa,' she returned gravely.
sentences.cn: “不，我永远不会爱任何人胜过爱爸爸，”她严肃地回嘴。

sentences.en: The oldest of men carried on the business gravely.
sentences.cn: 那些顶老的老人们正在严肃地办理业务.

sentences.en: We considered gravely before giving our consent.
sentences.cn: 我们经过慎重考虑后才应承此事.
